sections.heading: 1. The Slowest Strawberry Picking Ever
sections.content:
Once upon a time, there was a special village where people picked strawberries.
But in this village, everyone had to go together and check each strawberry being picked.

"Was this strawberry picked properly?"
"Yes, I saw it!"
"Me too!"
"Then it's real~"

It took too long to pick even one strawberry.
Because too many people had to be involved, it was impossible to pick strawberries fast. The villagers were worried.

sections.content:
Boundless is a magical helper that lets people trust important work without checking every step.
The days of needing 100 people to pick one strawberry are over.
Now, one person picks and everyone else checks with magic paper!

And this wizard is still building new strawberry markets in other towns.
Maybe they'll come to our village next?
